name: Lunar Lander (itch) (flawedSpoon)
description:
LunarLander is a classic arcade style platformer complete with online leaderboards. Check high scores at https://thingsnstuff.in/lunar_lander. Writtin in python with the pygame library.

Collect anti-matter, land safely, and evacuate with your loot! Fight against an ever-increasing gravity and dodge space debris while achieving the highest score possible. 

Make your mark!
